About this site

The Legend Of Zelda: Tears Of The Kingdom

4/5 Stars

Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom is a fantastic addition to the Zelda series. The graphics are stunning, the gameplay is smooth, and the story is engaging. The puzzles are challenging and the dungeons are well-crafted. The world is vast and full of secrets to discover. The new abilities and weapons add a fresh twist to the traditional Zelda formula. My only complaint is that some of the side quests can be a bit repetitive. Overall, Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom is a must-play for any fan of the series.
